With immense pride we would like to inform you all that these lovely cookies were baked by our vendor @thecakecompanyin! Here’s more power to @chefchhavi ♥️ And guys, to get such cookies for your own event contact us and we’ll get you the best deal with @thecakecompanyin @cosmoindia #cosmopolitanIndia #taimuralikhan #blogger #cosmobloggerawards2018 #cookies #yummy #cakes #events #awards #thecakecompany #weddings #birthdays #fun #events #cookiedecorating #cookiesofinstagram #globalfiestastudio_india
A post shared by Taimur Ali Khan (@taimuralikhanworld) on Mar 25, 2019 at 11:11pm PDT
title: As If Dolls Weren't Enough, Now Taimur Ali Khan-Inspired Cookies Have Become The Latest Fad!
description: After the Taimur doll took over the internet some time ago, now a whole new level of Taimur’s popularity was seen at the Cosmo India Blogger’s Award 2019, where Taimur cookies were served to the guests. Yes, a chef named Anahita Dhondy had baked the cookies. She even shared the pictures of the Taimur cookies, the next big thing that is breaking the internet now.
